Subject: Re: Destrons-Cerberus and the Four Nightmares

X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 110
From: Yanshosh@...

::Shredder::

Shredder's eyes narrow as he listens to Cerebrus' speach, the ex-Pred 
Destron's hands sliding behing his back to hold his chain guns.

"Now listen here!" he says to the bots, "You can't just come in and take 
over! Destrons, attack those bots, autoguns open fire!"

He jumps into the air, flying up as he opens fire with both chainguns on 
Cerebrus, hoping the other destrons would follow suit.
